subject: PGA Championship
Golf
lead_paragraph: The magic of Rory McIlroy’s dazzling 2012 victory seems to have dried up. He’s looking for a return to form at this year’s P.G.A. Championship.
snippet: The magic of Rory McIlroy’s dazzling 2012 victory seems to have dried up. He’s looking for a return to form at this year’s P.G.A. Championship.
